name: CLAIM_INFO
description: This table contains information from claim info records for Hospital and Professional Billing.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the claim information record.

columns.name: CLAIM_NAME
columns.description: The description of the claim record.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The billing system accounts receivable account ID associated with this claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The claim type category of the claim. Identifies whether the claim was filed as a workers' compensation or commercial claim.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the staff member who entered the claim into the system.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date on which this claim was entered into the system.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID of the coverage used for this claim.  This column can be used to report on coverages that are associated with a hospital account.

columns.name: ADMIT_DATETIME
columns.description: The admission date and time for the patient encounter associated with the claim.

columns.name: CLM_PAT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient status category ID for the patient for whom this claim was filed.
entries: Expired in a Medical Facility (e.g. hospital, SNF, ICF, or free standing hospice)
Discharged/transferred to a Federal Health Care Facility
Hospice - Medical Facility (Certified) Providing Hospice Level of Care
Discharged/transferred to a Hospital-Based Medicare Approved Swing Bed
Discharged/transferred to an Inpatient Rehab Facility (IRF)
Discharged/transferred to a Medicare Certified Long Term Care Hospital (LTCH)
Discharged/transferred to a Nursing Fac Certified under Medicaid but not Medicare
Discharged/transferred to a Psychiatric Hospital or Psychiatric Hospital Unit
Discharged/transferred to a Critical Access Hospital (CAH)
Disch/trans to Another Type of Health Care Inst not Defined Elsewhere in this List
Disch/transfer/referral to another inst for outpat services (discontinued 4/1/2003)
Disch/transfer/referral to this inst for outpatient services (discontinued 4/1/2003)
Discharged to Home or Self Care (Routine Discharge)
Discharged/transferred to a Short-Term General Hospital for Inpatient Care
Discharged/transferred to Skilled Nursing Facility (SNF) with Medicare Certification
Discharged/transferred to a Facility that Provides Custodial or Supportive Care
Discharged/transferred to a Designated Cancer Center or Children's Hospital
Discharged/transferred to Home Under Care of Organized Home Health Service Org
Left Against Medical Advice or Discontinued Care
Discharged/transferred to home under care of home IV therapy provider (disc 10/1/05)
Admitted as an Inpatient to this Hospital

columns.name: PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the provider for the encounter associated with this claim.

columns.name: ADMISSION_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The admission source (e.g., physician referral, clinic referral, Health Maintenance Organization (HMO) referral, transfer from a hospital, transfer from a skilled nursing facility, emergency room, court/law enforcement, information not available) for the encounter associated with this claim.
entries: Transfer from Skilled Nursing (SNF), Intermediate Care (ICF) or Assisted Living (ALF)
Transfer from Another Health Care Facility
Transfer from Psych, Substance Abuse, or Rehab Hospital
Transfer from Another Home Health Agency
Readmission to Same Home Health Agency
Transfer from One Distinct Unit to another Distinct Unit in Same Hospital
Transfer from another Home Health Agency
Readmission to same Home Health Agency

columns.name: ADMISSION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The admission type for the patient encounter associated with this claim (e.g., emergency, urgent, elective, newborn, trauma center, information not available).

columns.name: ADMIT_DX_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis ID for the admitting diagnosis of the encounter associated with this claim.

columns.name: ILL_INJ_LMP_C_NAME
columns.description: The category type identifying the claim as resulting from illness, injury or pregnancy (e.g., illness, accident (injury), pregnancy (last menstrual period, or LMP)).

columns.name: REL_CONDITION_C_NAME
columns.description: The related condition for the claim (e.g. Auto, Other Party Liability, Other Accident Related Injury, Patient Employment, Crime Victim).

columns.name: DOC_CTRL_NUM
columns.description: The document control number (DCN) for the claim record.

columns.name: INJURY_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time on which the injury resulting in the claim occurred.

columns.name: ACCIDENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The accident type for the injury resulting in the claim (e.g., Workers' Compensation, Automobile).

columns.name: IS_EPSDT_YN
columns.description: This is a yes/no flag indicating whether or not the patient is being seen for an Early Periodic Screening Diagnosis and Treatment (EPSDT) program.

columns.name: EPSDT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Early Periodic Screening and Diagnosis Treatment (EPSDT) program value.

columns.name: WC_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: Workers' Comp Claim Number for the claim record.

columns.name: WC_EMPLOYER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the employer associated with a Workers' Comp claim.

columns.name: WC_EMPLOYER_ID_EMPLOYER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the employer.

columns.name: TRAN_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Ambulance transport code.

columns.name: TRAN_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Ambulance transport reason code.
entries: Nearest Facility for Care of Symptoms, Complaints, or Both
For the Benefit of a Preferred Physician
For the Nearness of Family Members
For the Care of a Specialist or for Availability of Specialized Equipment

columns.name: TRAN_DIST
columns.description: Ambulance transport distance.

columns.name: CLM_LOGIN_SA_ID
columns.description: The user's login service area at the time of the creation of the claim information record.

columns.name: ILL_INJ_LMP_DT
columns.description: The date of the onset of illness, the occurrence of the injury, or the patient's last menstrual period (related to pregnancy).

columns.name: AUTO_ACDNT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Auto accident State.

columns.name: EMPY_RELATED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether patient's condition is related to employment.

columns.name: FIRST_CONSULT_DT
columns.description: First consult date.

columns.name: PAT_CHIEF_COMPLAINT
columns.description: Patients chief complaint.

columns.name: EMERG_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure is related to an emergency.

columns.name: LAST_WORKED_DT
columns.description: Date last worked.

columns.name: RETURN_TO_WORK_DT
columns.description: Return to work date.

columns.name: DISCHARGE_DT
columns.description: Discharge date.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB_NAME_C_NAME
columns.description: Outside lab name.

columns.name: HLTH_APPR_SCRN_YN
columns.description: Routine health appraisal/screening procedure.

columns.name: SIG_ON_FILE_YN
columns.description: Signature on file?

columns.name: WK_COMP_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: Workers' Comp claim number.

columns.name: WK_COMP_INJ_DESC
columns.description: Workers' Comp injury description.

columns.name: WK_COMP_APRV_CODE
columns.description: Workers' Comp approval code.

columns.name: WK_COMP_MED_RLS_DT
columns.description: Workers' Comp medical release date.

columns.name: DF_DELAY_RSN_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Default delay reason code.
entries: Proof of Eligibility Unknown or Unavailable
Delay in Delivery of Custom-made Appliances
Original Claim Rejected or Denied Due to a Reason Unrelated to the Billing Limitation
Administration Delay in the Prior Approval Process

columns.name: FIRST_NEXT_VISIT_C_NAME
columns.description: First/subsequent visit indicator.

columns.name: MED_HX_SOC_WORKER
columns.description: Social worker associated with this visit.

columns.name: MED_HX_PSYCHOLOGIST
columns.description: Psychologist associated with this visit.

columns.name: MED_HX_SUP_PROV
columns.description: Supervising medical doctor for this visit.

columns.name: MED_HX_COUNSELOR
columns.description: Counselor associated with this visit.

columns.name: HDH_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the health and developmental history assessment.

columns.name: PHY_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the physical assessment.

columns.name: PHY_EXAM_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the physical assessment.

columns.name: VISION_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the vision assessment.

columns.name: VISION_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the vision assessment.

columns.name: HEARING_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the hearing assessment.

columns.name: HEARING_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the hearing assessment.

columns.name: DEV_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the developmental assessment.

columns.name: DEV_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the developmental assessment.

columns.name: NUTRI_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the nutritional assessment.

columns.name: NUTRI_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the nutritional assessment.

columns.name: OTHER_TREATMNT_DT
columns.description: Stores date of other treatment.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_NAME
columns.description: Name of the hospital where the patient was admitted.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_ADDRESS
columns.description: The street address of the hospital where the patient was admitted.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_CITY
columns.description: The city where the hospital to which the patient was admitted is located.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The state where the hospital to which the patient was admitted is located.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP of the hospital to which the patient was admitted.

columns.name: HOSP_REQ_YN
columns.description: Flag indicating whether or not hospitalization is required.

columns.name: ADV_RET_WORK_YN
columns.description: Flag to indicate whether a patient was advised to return to work.

columns.name: ADV_RET_WORK_DT
columns.description: The date that patient was advised to return to work.

columns.name: REF_PHYS_NAME
columns.description: Stores the referring physician's name.

columns.name: REF_PHYS_ADDR
columns.description: Stores the referring physician's address.

columns.name: REF_PHYS_CITY
columns.description: Stores the referring physician's city.

columns.name: REF_PHYS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the referring physician's state.

columns.name: REF_PHYS_ZIP
columns.description: Stores the referring physician's ZIP code.

columns.name: REF_PHYS_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores referring physician's specialty.
entries: CCM Housing Assistance and Shelter Services
CCM Financial Counseling and Assistance Services
CCM Language and Communication Assistance Services
ReCS <script>alert("This should not show up in a popup!!!");</script>

columns.name: REF_PHYS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the referring physician's reason for the referral.

columns.name: FIRST_TREAT_HOUR_TM
columns.description: First treatment hour. Some extensions add a value code to your claim if this item has a value.

columns.name: PAT_PREV_TREATED_YN
columns.description: Is patient previously treated?

columns.name: IDE_NUM
columns.description: Investigational Device Exemption Number.

columns.name: EST_DOB_DT
columns.description: The estimated date of delivery for the pregnancy.

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_IND_YN
columns.description: Indicate if the patient's condition is due to an accident or illness caused by another party.

columns.name: REFERRAL_SOURCE_ID
columns.description: The referral source for the visit.

columns.name: REFERRAL_SOURCE_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: EMERGENCY_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Emergency Service Code for emergency room services.  This field is required for Illinois Department of Public Aid claims for emergency related services.  It will populate record EA0-05.0 in the Illinois Department of Public Aid NSF 2.00 electronic claim file and box 10b-other on the IDPA 2360 paper claim form.
entries: Reparative surgery necessitated by antecedent trauma
Decompensated vital functions or threat to vital functions
Congenital defects in a newborn infant
Any condition requiring prompt diagnostic procedures
Any other condition causing serious pain or possible death

columns.name: DISABILITY_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The extent of the disability caused by the incident.

columns.name: DISABILITY_FROM_DT
columns.description: The date the disability started.

columns.name: DISABILITY_TO_DT
columns.description: The date the disability ended.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB_YN
columns.description: Indicate if lab services outside the provider's office are involved.

columns.name: OUTSIDE_LAB_CHARGE
columns.description: The cost of services performed at the outside lab.

columns.name: FAM_PLANNING_YN
columns.description: Indicate whether the patient is being seen for family planning care.

columns.name: SPECIAL_PROGRAM_C_NAME
columns.description: The special program under which the services rendered to the patient were performed.
entries: Induced Abortion - Danger to Woman's Life
Medicare Demonstration Project for Lung Volume Reduction Surgery

columns.name: PGM_FOR_HANDICAP_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the patient's relationship to the sponsor for the program that benefits people with handicaps.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_LOB
columns.description: A free text nature/line of business for the employer.

columns.name: OTH_INFO
columns.description: Any additional free text information that should be recorded in conjunction with the claim.

columns.name: AUTH_DT
columns.description: Authorization date.

columns.name: CHIR_FIRST_TREAT_DT
columns.description: The initiation date of the course of treatment for chiropractic services.

columns.name: CHIR_X_RAY_DT
columns.description: The X-ray date for chiropractic services.

columns.name: NAT_OF_COND_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the nature of condition code for Spinal Manipulation.
entries: Acute Manifestation of a Chronic Condition

columns.name: CHIR_ACUTE_MANI_DT
columns.description: Stores the acute manifestation date for the spinal manipulation therapy.

columns.name: HBG_HCT_TEST_INCL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether hemoglobin/hematocrit (HGB/HCT) test is included.

columns.name: URINALYSIS_INCL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether Urinalysis test is included.

columns.name: TUBERCULOSIS_INCL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether tuberculosis test is included.

columns.name: LEAD_TEST_INCL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether lead test is included.

columns.name: SICKLE_CELL_INCL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicate whether sickle-cell test is included.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_INCL_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the immunizations.

columns.name: CARDIO_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the cardiovascular assessment.

columns.name: CARDIO_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the cardiovascular assessment.

columns.name: URINARY_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the genital/urinary tract assessment.

columns.name: URINARY_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the genital/urinary tract assessment.

columns.name: DIABETE_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the diabetes assessment.

columns.name: DIABETE_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the diabetes assessment.

columns.name: DENTAL_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for the dental assessment.

columns.name: DENTAL_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the dental assessment.

columns.name: IMMNZTN_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for the immunizations.

columns.name: EDU_EXAM_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The exam code for health education.

columns.name: EDU_RFL_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The referral code for health education.

columns.name: ONLY_CAUSE_YN
columns.description: Flag to distinguish whether or not this injury is the only cause of the patient's condition.

columns.name: PAT_BURNED_YN
columns.description: Flag to determine whether or not patient has been burned.

columns.name: XRAY_BY_WHOM
columns.description: The name of the person or entity that performed x-rays.

columns.name: WC_XRAY_DT
columns.description: The date comparative x-rays were taken.

columns.name: POLIO_IMMNZTN_C_NAME
columns.description: The immunization status for Polio.

columns.name: DPT_TD_IMMNZTN_C_NAME
columns.description: The immunization status for Diphtheria, pertussis, and tetanus (DPT)/tetanus and diphtheria (DT).

columns.name: MEASLES_IMMNZTN_C_NAME
columns.description: The immunization status for Measles.

columns.name: MUMPS_IMMNZTN_C_NAME
columns.description: The immunization status for Mumps.

columns.name: RUBELLA_IMMNZTN_C_NAME
columns.description: The immunization status for Rubella.

columns.name: HIB_IMMNZTN_C_NAME
columns.description: The immunization status for Haemophilus influenzae type B (HIB).

columns.name: CHAMP_NONAVAIL_YN
columns.description: Indicate if the provider has a signed Tricare statement of non-availability on file indicating that the services associated with this claim were not available at a military treatment facility.

columns.name: CHAMP_NONAV_STMT_NO
columns.description: The number of the Tricare non-availability statement.

columns.name: CHAMPUS_ORG
columns.description: Tricare Organization.

columns.name: CHAMPUS_STATION
columns.description: Tricare Station.

columns.name: CHAMP_MILIT_ACC_YN
columns.description: Indicate if the services performed were treatment as a result of a military accident.

columns.name: ALTERNATE_CLM_ID
columns.description: Alternate Claim ID.

columns.name: REF_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the referring provider.

columns.name: MC_CLAIMS_WKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the workflow associated with the claim (shadow claims, Accounts Payable claims, export only claims, etc.)
entries: Externally paid claims with bucket update

columns.name: CLM_SENSITIVITY_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the sensitivity type of the claim.

columns.name: PLACE_OF_SERVICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the place of service associated with the claim.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location for this claim.
